markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Engelidis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2335)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 45

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Engelidis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2335)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 393</row>

**Perception** +28; darkvision

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +30, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +31, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +29, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +30

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +6

**Con** +5

**Int** +5

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +9
</row>

**Coven** A spirit naga adds [_hallucination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [_mind probe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=193), and [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) to their coven's spells.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 40 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +30 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 290

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 5d8+13 piercing plus spirit naga venom

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 39, attack +26
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Humanoid Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=153), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Misdirection](/Spells.aspx?ID=198) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Clairaudience](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Telekinetic Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=332) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199) (4 slots)
- **7th**
[Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [Power Word Blind](/Spells.aspx?ID=226) (4 slots)
- **8th**
[Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75), [Power Word Stun](/Spells.aspx?ID=228) (2 slots)

**Rituals** DC 39

- **2nd**
[Inveigle](/Rituals.aspx?ID=14)

**Spirit Naga Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 28; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) 1 (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 round)

</column>
name: Engelidis
